person.title: Simple & Effective
person.text: Just like taking a photo, Sealfie automatically handles all technical verifications for you. No training required.

send.title: Unparalleled Security
send.text: Each transaction is securely verified instantly. We create a bundle of irrefutable digital evidence – far more reliable than traditional MFA.

shield.title: Adaptable & Scalable
shield.text: Sealfie integrates seamlessly with your existing processes.  Contact us to discuss your customized integration and expand verification sources.

path.title: Automation & Audit Trail
path.text: Sealfie automates verifications and preserves a complete audit trail for every transaction, ensuring complete traceability and compliance.

users.title: Streamlined Security
users.text: Reduce the complexity of security without compromising protection. Starting at $195/person/year.

cost.title: Pricing
cost.text: Includes standard validation and up to 20 validations per year.  Custom quotes available for tailored integrations, increased validation volumes, and priority support.

support.title: Dedicated Support
support.text: Full support included – no IT integration required.  We adapt to your processes and systems upon request.

period.title: Subscription Terms
period.text: Annual subscription, cancellable at any time. Larger enterprises and bespoke requirements require a consultation.

onboard.title: Quick Deployment
onboard.text: You’ll be operational within 30 minutes – minimal system integration ensures immediate protection during an attack.

techno.title: Advanced Technology
techno.text: We dynamically perform multi-source technical verifications in real-time. Expanding verification sources is simple and seamless.

description.title: Revolutionize Your Cybersecurity
description.text: Faced with increasingly sophisticated deepfakes and identity theft, traditional cybersecurity is exhausting: endless training, constant alerts, and complex MFA.
description.text2: Sealfie radically changes the equation – just one simple process instead of knowing ALL possible attacks. A selfie for you, we handle the technical complexities and produce a list of attestations more reliable than traditional MFA processes.
description.text3: We coordinate technical information sources behind the scenes while your teams enjoy an experience as smooth as taking a photo. Thanks to our deeptech technology, we’ll adapt to threats without making usage more complex.
